SpellDef.Description: This unit counts as having a Bloodline.
This unit is a Black Naja of the Serpent Cult
Provides 25% resistance to spells and all forms of damage for 3 turns.
Caster goes into defensive mode and if attacked before their next turn, may act immediately.
Caster goes into defensive mode and if attacked before their next turn, may act immediately.
Inflicts 2 (+1 per level) Cold damage to a random enemy unit. This damage is multiplied by the amount of units casting.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Inflicts %d cold damage to a random enemy unit.

SpellDef.Description: Inflicts 10 fire damage, multiplied by the number of times the casting unit has suffered melee damage, half if resisted.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Inflicts %d fire damage on the target, half if resisted.

SpellDef.Description: An attack that causes the target to become disoriented for 1 turn (50% chance to swing at a random unit in melee).
Heals the caster a random amount up to double the casters level.
Unit goes into defensive stance and gains +10 Defense and Spell Resistance and cannot be knocked prone until their next turn.
Entrench a tile, which gives units in that tile +10 to Dodge, +10 Dodge vs Ranged and immunity to Swarm.
Ranged attack that applies a random effect to target enemy unit unless they resist.
Launch an attack that inflicts half normal damage, pushes the target back 1 tile and knocks them prone.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Launch an attack that inflicts half normal damage, pushes the target back 1 tile and knocks them prone.

SpellDef.Description: Inflicts 2 lightning damage (multiplied by number of casting units) and blinds an adjacent target enemy for 3 turns if they fail to resist.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Inflicts %d lightning damage and blinds an adjacent target enemy for 3 turns if they fail to resist.

SpellDef.Description: A dark prayer that grants a random effect to the caster.
All allied units receive a +1 Attack bonus for 5 turns (stackable).
Unit is +1 Initiative and Moves in combat when stationed in a city.
+2 Attack and -1 Defense each time this unit damages an opponent with a melee attack.
Increases Unrest in the target city by 10%.
Convert a shard in your territory into a crystal crag.
Target enemy unit suffers -2 to Initiative.
Transforms target land tile into arctic terrain.
Target enemy champion loses at random either 0, 50% or 100% hit points.
Convert 100 Gildar into 10 Metal.
Convert 100 Gildar into 10 Crystal.
Summons a Wizards Eye onto the map to scout the area.
Creates an Arcane Outpost on the map which extends your Zone of Control.
Teleports the caster, and their army, to a tile in friendly territory.
Target enemy army takes 12 to 24 lightning damage. Can only be cast within your territory.
Grants the unit the Nature Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Nature Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Shadow Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Shadow Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Battle Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Battle Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Beast Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Beast Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Air Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Air Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Earth Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Earth Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Fire Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Water Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Water Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Life Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Life Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Grants the unit the Death Adept ability

GameModifier.Provides: Grants the unit the Death Adept ability

SpellDef.Description: Throw a javelin at a nearby enemy. Does 5 damage multiplied by the number of unit members.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Throw a javelin at a nearby enemy, causing %d damage.

SpellDef.Description: Throw an axe at a nearby enemy. Does 5 damage multiplied by the number of unit members and has a chance of knocking target unit prone.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Throw an axe at a nearby enemy, causing %d damage and has a chance of knocking target unit prone.

GameModifier.Provides: Has a chance equal to the damage done of knocking the victim prone

SpellDef.Description: Throw a hellfire bomb at a nearby enemy, causing 4 fire damage (multiplied by number of members in the casting unit) in a 1 tile radius and has a chance of knocking units prone.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Throw a hellfire bomb at a nearby enemy, causing %d fire damage in a 1 tile radius and has a chance of knocking units prone.

GameModifier.Provides: Has a chance equal to the damage done of knocking the victim prone

SpellDef.Description: Melee attacks have a 10% chance of knocking the target prone.
Target unit gets +20% to Attack, Initiative and Dodge for 5 turns.
Target unit gains +50% to Dodge and their Attack is halved unless they resist.
+1 Attack and +1 Counterattack, when using a Spear
+20 Dodge vs missile attacks and +5 Defense when defending, if using a Shield
Summon a level 3 Ice Warg
